title: Great Arab Minds Committee | His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi | His Excellency Saeed Al Nazari

quotes: Al Gergawi founded Dubai Holding and chaired its board until 2017.
In 2018, Al Gergawi was chosen to be a member of the UN Secretary-General’s High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation
He oversaw the creation of the Dubai Quality Award in 1994
the Dubai Government Excellence Program in 1997
the Mohammed bin Rashid Government Excellence Award in 2009
